explains: v. 使丰富；充实；浓缩（enrich 的过去分词）
wordGroup: highly enriched uranium 高浓缩铀

sentences.en: Enriched uranium is a key component of a nuclear weapon.
sentences.cn: 浓缩铀是核武器的一个关键组成部分。

sentences.en: The wounds in body and mind will get healed temporarily and spiritual emptiness will be enriched for a while.
sentences.cn: 身心的创伤得到了暂时的平复，精神的空虚得到了刹那的充实。

sentences.en: Salts are enriched around electriferous groups of polymer molecules in solution, which formed a salt concentration gradient.
sentences.cn: 溶液中的盐份富集在聚合物分子的带电基团附近，并形成盐浓度梯度分布。
